issue.title: Enhance StructArray:: try_from(values: Vec<(&str, ArrayRef)>)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11264](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11264). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Don't set wrong nullable when null buffer has all bits set
